Yoututor - Learn Anything with YouTube Videos

Unlock the potential of every YouTube video with Yoututor, an AI-driven browser extension that transforms your viewing experience into a dynamic learning journey. Yoututor generates customized quizzes for each video you watch, offering an interactive and engaging way to learn about various subjects.

Key Features:

‚úèÔ∏è Custom Quizzes: Yoututor creates quizzes tailored to the video's topic, featuring both multiple-choice and open-ended questions to challenge your understanding.

üéì Interactive Learning: Engage with AI-generated questions right on the video screen, integrating learning seamlessly into your viewing.

üß† Diverse Knowledge: Each video brings 5 carefully selected questions, designed to enhance comprehension and knowledge across various subjects.

üìö Adaptive Learning: Experience a personalized learning curve as Yoututor adjusts quizzes based on your knowledge level and progress in different subjects.

üåü Versatile Education: Suitable for learners at all levels, ideal for anyone keen to expand their knowledge in fields such as technology, science, history, arts, and more.

How it Works:

While watching videos on YouTube, Yoututor intelligently crafts quizzes related to the video's subject matter. Whether they are multiple-choice or open-ended, the extension integrates learning into your viewing experience effortlessly.

Enhance Your Knowledge:

From tech and lifestyle to education and entertainment, Yoututor turns your video watching into a learning opportunity. Explore a wide range of topics, broaden your knowledge base, and reinforce learning with Yoututor's customized quizzes.
